name: Just Be Happy
description:
An entry for JamGoJam 15, made in Unreal Engine 4.

Don't be sad. You should never be sad. Only be happy.

Controls:

Left click to move. Remember to jump at an angle to avoid hitting into the object you're currently hanging onto!

[ to lower the volume

] to raise the volume

Esc to close the game

Criteria:

CriterionImplementationEndless RunnerThe level infinitely generates, getting harder the further you progress. It's highly important to keep moving, otherwise the creature chasing you will catch up.
HappyCollecting happy colors is key to survival. Collecting negative colors will be your downfall. Happiness is the only emotion in the world. Be happy.
HyperactiveJust Be Happy is a very fast paced game where you are, quite literally, constantly bouncing off the walls.ChiptuneWhile happy, upbeat chiptune music plays. When sad, the music transitions to a much more depressing tune.
